name: Android Material Icon Maker
description:
A full theming kit for designing Material icons for Android, system or apps.


Kit includes:

- Material Color Palette (2014)

- examples for tint, shade/shadows on colors (legacy)

- keylines for system icons

- templates and keylines for legacy app icons

- templates, keylines and previews for adaptive app icons

- new Android robot and color palette


The file is based on the official guides from Google.
